backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining user roles, location tracking, SOS alerts, access control, and distance calculations with profile management APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required changes for location refresh intervals and SOS targeting radius along with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of major frontend source files including pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes with styling tokens used across the app.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting up the app container and loading the React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup, and routing to ambulance or police interfaces.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing copyright text and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header bar displaying branding, share link controls, user info, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/LinkDomainInfoPa: Dialog showing shareable app URL and explanations for configuring custom domains.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity with ambulance and police role visuals.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component letting users enter their name and select ambulance or police role, then saving via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCont: UI control for copying the appâ€™s share URL using clipboard API with a fallback input field.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for user profiles, location updates, and SOS actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and emergency colors with global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Ambulance UI that tracks geolocation, sends periodic updates, and allows triggering or deactivating SOS alerts.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: React police dashboard that tracks officer geolocation, fetches nearby ambulances and active SOS alerts, filters stale locations, plays alert sounds, and periodically updates police location.
frontend/src/utils/getShareUrl.ts: Returns a full shareable URL string built from the browser's current location fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, layout settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing SOS features, interval and radius update requirements, and pending feature requests.
